description:
Khadlaj Rose and Romance EDP 100ML - A Captivating Floral Symphony

Experience the enchanting allure of Khadlaj Rose and Romance, a luxurious Arabian perfume that celebrates the timeless elegance of rose with a modern twist. This exquisite Arabic perfume captures the essence of romantic passion in a stunning 100ml bottle, perfect for those who appreciate sophisticated floral fragrances with depth and character. âœ¨

  • ðŸ’Ž Impressive longevity that lasts throughout the day

  • ðŸ’Ž Suitable for special occasions and everyday luxury

Khadlaj Perfumes, a distinguished name in Middle Eastern perfumery, has crafted this Rose and Romance EDP as a tribute to the region's rich olfactory heritage. Founded with a commitment to blending traditional Arabian perfume craftsmanship with contemporary sensibilities, Khadlaj has become synonymous with luxury and quality in the fragrance world. ðŸ”¥

This bestselling fragrance opens with a sparkling burst of Bulgarian rose enhanced by bergamot's citrusy brightness. As it settles, the heart reveals an exquisite bouquet of Damascus rose intertwined with jasmine and lily of the valley, creating a truly romantic core. The base notes of amber, musk, vanilla, and sandalwood provide a warm, lingering foundation that makes Rose and Romance truly unforgettable.

Frequently Asked Question

Q: How long does Khadlaj Rose and Romance EDP last on skin?
A: Khadlaj Rose and Romance EDP offers exceptional longevity, typically lasting 8-10 hours on skin. The high-quality amber and musk base notes act as natural fixatives, allowing the fragrance to develop beautifully throughout the day while maintaining its distinctive rose character. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points on moisturized skin. Many users report that the scent is still detectable even after a full day of wear, making it an excellent value new arrival in your fragrance collection.

short_description:
Khadlaj Rose and Romance EDP 100ML is a luxurious floral symphony featuring premium Bulgarian and Damascus roses complemented by jasmine, amber, and musk. This captivating Arabic perfume offers exceptional longevity and sillage, perfect for those who appreciate sophisticated rose fragrances with depth.
